Pre-Game Insights: The Utah Jazz are currently in 15th place in the Western Conference with 0 wins and 3 losses.
The Sacramento Kings, with the addition of DeMar DeRozan, are considered contenders for the Western Conference title.
The probable starting lineup for Utah Jazz includes Collin Sexton, Kayonte George, Taylor Hendricks, Lauri Markkanen, and Walker Kessler.
The probable starting lineup for Sacramento Kings includes De'Aaron Fox, Keaon Ellis, Keegan Murray, DeMar DeRozan, and Domontas Sabonis.
